title: Miley Cyrus gets hot and heavy with beau Cody Simpson as she speaks of aphrodisiacs in steamy post
text:
She has stunned fans with her wild love life in recent weeks.

And Miley Cyrus seemed determined on her mission to leave jaws dropping as she took to Instagram on Monday to share a snap while kissing Cody Simpson - with their steamy love coming after her splits from Liam Hemsworth and Kaitlynn Carter.

The songstress, 26, took a snap over dinner while adding the caption: 'Soup is an aphrodisiac', shortly before her mum Trish and his mum Angie gave their seal of approval for the blossoming romance.

Up close and personal: And Miley Cyrus seemed determined on her mission to leave jaws dropping as she took to Instagram on Monday to share a snap while kissing Cody Simpson

Miley got up close and personal with her new beau in the sexy snap as they enjoyed a bowl of soup each, while she added the caption: 'Soup is an aphrodisiac'.

Meanwhile, Angie shared a snap of the duo with the sweet caption: 'Puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy. Hearing your laughs and seeing the smiles on your faces lights up my heart. #happyforyouguys #beautifullsouls'.

Responding under the post, Miley's mum Tish added: 'Puts a smile on my face too @angiemsimpson love you my sweet friend'.

The steamy post comes after it was made clear that Miley apparently has a go-to Instagram filter for all of her relationships, as discovered by an eagle-eyed fan.

Having a laugh: The songstress, 26, took a snap over dinner while adding the caption: 'Soup is an aphrodisiac', shortly before her mum Trish and his mum Angie gave their seal of approval for the blossoming romance

Happy days: Responding under the post, Miley's mum Tish added: 'Puts a smile on my face too @angiemsimpson love you my sweet friend'

Instagram user XMC.IG posted a collage of Cyrus' Instagram photos, one from her wedding last December with Liam another undated photo with her one-time girlfriend Kaitlynn and another with her current boyfriend Cody.

The user pointed out that Cyrus used the, 'same filter' on all three photos, with the singer even responding, stating, 'Classic.'

The first photo on the left of the collage was taken on Cyrus' wedding day with her longtime boyfriend Liam Hemsworth on their December 23, 2018 wedding.

The couple started dating off and on in 2009 and they were engaged once from May 2012 to September 2013, and then from October 2016 until they were married in December 2018.

Shock: Miley's mum Tish proved to have given her stamp of approval on their union

Romantic filter: Miley apparently has a go-to Instagram filter for all of her romantic relationships, as discovered by an eagle-eyed fan

Miley and Kaitlynn: After Cyrus split with Hemsworth in August 2019, the singer was attached to Kaitlynn Carter, the separated wife of The Hills star Brody Jenner

After Cyrus split with Hemsworth in August 2019, the singer was attached to Kaitlynn Carter, the separated wife of The Hills star Brody Jenner.

Cyrus and Carter dated for just a few months until September 2019, and earlier this month, Cyrus announced she was in a relationship with her longtime friend Cody Simpson.

'I’m very happy. We are very, very happy,' Simpson told People over the weekend about their relationship.

'She’s creative. She’s very passionate about what she does, and I’m very similar in that sense,' he added.

Miley and Cody: Cyrus and Carter dated for just a few months until September 2019, and earlier this month, Cyrus announced she was in a relationship with her longtime friend Cody Simpson.

'That’s why we get along so well. We just have a ball, yeah, and that’s the most important part of a relationship, you know?' he concluded.

Simpson added that they had known each other for so long and they, 'found each other again in a space where we’re both not partying, working real hard, and it just keeps things healthy and it’s good.'

'Any girlfriends I’ve had in the past has always been immediate romance and so it’s a different experience having been friends with somebody before and it developing naturally into something more,' he said.

Wedding photo: The first photo on the left of the collage was taken on Cyrus' wedding day with her longtime boyfriend Liam Hemsworth on their December 23, 2018 wedding

Cyrus released her seventh studio album She Is Miley Cyrus earlier this year, and she dropped the new song Slide Away in August, shortly after her separation with Hemsworth.

She also teamed up with Ariana Grande and Lana Del Ray for Don't Call Me Angel, which was released on September 13.

That song will be featured on the soundtrack to the Charlie's Angels reboot, in theaters November 15.
